meanings.definition: The male and female nuclei in a fertilized egg before they fuse.
meanings.sent1: The pronuclei in the egg were waiting to merge.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the pronuclei to understand fertilization better.
meanings.sent3: The pronuclei had a race to see which one would reach the center first.
meanings.sent4: The pronuclei danced around each other, hesitant to combine.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the pronuclei looked like tiny glowing orbs.

meanings.definition: The nuclei of the sperm and egg before fusion during fertilization.
meanings.sent1: Before fertilization, the pronuclei of the sperm and egg are separate.
meanings.sent2: The pronuclei carry the genetic material needed for new life.
meanings.sent3: The pronuclei threw a party to celebrate their upcoming union.
meanings.sent4: The pronuclei journeyed towards each other, drawn by an invisible force.
meanings.sent5: The pronuclei seemed to hum with anticipation, eager to combine.
